About Me & Skills

About Me

I'm an Information Technology student passionate about software development, system management, and emerging technologies. My journey in IT has been focused on building practical solutions and continuously learning new technologies.

I specialize in frontend development with a strong foundation in modern web technologies. My academic projects and hands-on experiences have equipped me with problem-solving abilities and adaptability in modern IT environments.

Current Student

What I Do

I offer comprehensive services in web development, system management, and modern technology solutions. Each service is tailored to meet your specific needs and deliver exceptional results.

Frontend Development

Creating responsive and interactive user interfaces using modern frameworks like React and Vue.js. I build fast, accessible, and user-friendly web applications that provide exceptional user experiences across all devices.

Web Design

Designing modern, clean, and intuitive web interfaces with a focus on user experience and visual appeal. I combine creativity with functionality to create websites that are both beautiful and highly functional.

Full-Stack Development

Building complete web applications from frontend to backend. I develop RESTful APIs, manage databases, and create seamless integrations between client and server components using Node.js and modern frameworks.

System Management

Managing and maintaining IT infrastructure, including server administration, network configuration, and cloud services. I ensure systems run efficiently and securely while implementing best practices for monitoring and optimization.

Resume

Professional Summary

Dedicated Information Technology student with a strong passion for creating innovative software solutions. Experienced in frontend development, system management, and modern web technologies. Proficient in JavaScript, React, Node.js, and various web frameworks. Strong problem-solving abilities and a commitment to writing clean, maintainable code. Always eager to learn new technologies and contribute to meaningful projects.
